references.paper_title: Structured Denoising Diffusion Models in Discrete State-Spaces
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the simplex diffusion language models used in TESS 2.

references.paper_title: FlashAttention: Fast and Memory-Efficient Exact Attention with IO-Awareness
references.reason: This paper introduces FlashAttention, a crucial optimization technique used to speed up training and inference in TESS 2.

references.paper_title: SSD-LM: Semi-autoregressive Simplex-based Diffusion Language Model for Text Generation and Modular Control
references.reason: This paper introduces the original SSD-LM model, which forms the basis for the architecture of TESS 2.
This paper introduces TESS, the immediate predecessor model to TESS 2, which is directly built upon.
This paper introduces the UL2 masking scheme, which is a key component of the adaptation recipe in TESS 2.
